bibl.title: The Background of "embateuein" (Col 2: 18) in Legal Papyri and Oracle Inscriptions.
bibl.seg: Francis Fred O., The Background of "embateuein" (Col 2: 18) in Legal Papyri and Oracle Inscriptions.

Conflict at Colossae. A Problem in the Interpretation of Early Christianity Illustrated by Selected Modern Studies. Revised Edition. Sources for Biblical Studies. 4 (Missoula, Montana, 1975) pp. 197-207.
